name: Cross Creek
description:
Cross Creek has Didymo. You MUST CHECK CLEAN DRY your gear before going into any other canyon. Even better, schedule Cross Creek as your last canyon, so that your gear gets to fully dry so that your conscience is clear and you do not spread this horrible pest to our other BEAUTIFUL CANYONS. Canyons nearby do not yet have Didymo.

Approach

Trail begins on southwest side of bridge. You'll be traveling on the canyon right side of the creek. Follow the well tracked trail for about 20-30 minutes and start in the upper section of cross.

Descent

Exit

Exit just before tunnel on canyon left

Red tape
